channel.title: Github on Gordy's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Github on Gordy's Blog

item.title: Org-Octopress Notes
item.description: I’ve been trying to sort-out the details of what is required to be able to maintain a GitHub pages site via Octopress / org-octopress from multiple computers. The slight complicating factor is that the location of the git repository for the site is different on the two computers that I am using.
